response.overview: "The Making of an Epic" is a 30-minute featurette included in the DVD and Blu-ray special editions of the 2006 film Flags of Our Fathers, directed by Clint Eastwood. The documentary provides a behind-the-scenes look at the production of the film, from pre-production to editing. It features interviews with the cast, the crew, and the author of the book the film is based on, James Bradley
response.title: The Making of an Epic
